description:
Calculator++ is a free calculator app for HP Touchpad with a simple set of basic calculator functions. A growing suite of special purpose advanced calculators is available as In-App Purchase.

The basic free calculator has: Plus, minus, product, division, square root, power-of-two, inverse and memory functions. Use the XXL buttons for easy use in landscape and portrait modes. 

Use In-App Purchase to extend this app with advanced calculators. Currently available are a Scientific Calculator with a vast function set and a financial calculator that bundles tools for the most common financial calculations. More calculators will be added when we finish developing them. To see a full feature list of the In-App Extensions before downloading this app, search the App Catalog for “Scientific Calculator” and “Financial Calculator”. All In-App Purchase items are at a discounted price compared to the equivalent stand-alone apps!

Please send feature requests, bug reports and general feedback to calculator@minderleister.com. We reply to every email, usually within a few hours. Please leave a review in the App Catalog but keep in mind that we cannot reply to those.
